com.vector.cfg.core.app

Interface IApplicationContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, IDisposable, IServiceContext

    @PublishedApi(value=CLASS_DEPENDENCY)
public interface IApplicationContext
extends IServiceContext
    The application context provides all project independent services and access to the application state.

    (c) Copyright Vctr Informatik GmbH. All Rights Reserved.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  IApplicationContext.ApplicationContextService

    • Method Detail

      • createProjectContext

        IProjectContext createProjectContext()
        This method will create a new ProjectContext.
        Returns:

      • getApplicationName

        java.lang.String getApplicationName(java.lang.String name,
                                    java.lang.String ext)
        Get a formatted application display name that contains the beta flag info if required.
        Returns:
        the application name

      • getApplicationSettings

        java.lang.Object getApplicationSettings()
        Get the current application settings.

        If the setRequiresApplicationSettings() was set, this method will block until the initializeApplicationSettings(Object) was called.

      • getApplicationVersion

        java.lang.String getApplicationVersion(org.osgi.framework.Version version)
        Get a formatted version string for displaying it within the application info.
        Returns:
        the application version string

      • getASR4DiagnosticsInMSR3SWCVersion

        IVersion getASR4DiagnosticsInMSR3SWCVersion()
        Get the SWC schema version number used to support using the MSR4 diagnostics configuration in a MSR3 delivery (see EVAL00100516 for details).
        Returns:
        the AUTOSAR schema version for generated SWCs for the ARS4 diagnostics in MSR3 feature.

      • getEclipseApplicationContext

        org.eclipse.equinox.app.IApplicationContext getEclipseApplicationContext()
        Gets the eclipse application context.
        Returns:
        the eclipse application context

      • getGeneratorSettings

        java.lang.Object getGeneratorSettings()
        Get the current application settings.

        If the setRequiresGeneratorSettings() was set, this method will block until the initializeGeneratorSettings(Object) was called.

      • getLocale

        java.util.Locale getLocale()
        Get the locale, that was active at the point the IApplicationContext was created. Always use this locale, since this stays constant even if the user changes the system locale during runtime. In this case he needs to restart the application.
        Returns:

      • getMode

        EApplicationMode getMode()
        Get the current application mode. Defaults to EApplicationMode.HEADLESS.
        Returns:

      • getProjectContext

        IProjectContext getProjectContext()
        Get the current IProjectContext instance.
        Returns:
        the project context.

      • getRequiresStartupWithoutSIP

        boolean getRequiresStartupWithoutSIP()
        Get the current application setting whether the application should startup with an SIP or not.

      • initializeApplicationSettings

        void initializeApplicationSettings(java.lang.Object settings)
        Init application settings.

      • initializeGeneratorSettings

        void initializeGeneratorSettings(java.lang.Object settings)
        Init generator settings.

      • isASR4DiagnosticsInMSR3

        boolean isASR4DiagnosticsInMSR3()
        Support of using the MSR4 diagnostics configuration in a MSR3 delivery (see EVAL00100516 for details).
        Returns:
        true, if application is in MSR4 diagnostics in MSR3 mode; false, else.

      • isAutomationAllowed

        boolean isAutomationAllowed()
        Indicates whether the automation feature is allowed to be used by the application or not.
        Note: this is required for demo purposes only.
        Returns:
        false, if property isn't defined or defined but set to false; true, else.

      • isBeta

        boolean isBeta()
        Get the application beta flag.
        Returns:
        the beta flag of the application

      • isDvCfgLibEnabled

        boolean isDvCfgLibEnabled()
        DvCfg Lib features enabled.
        Returns:
        true, if application is a DvCfg Lib, false, else.

      • isHotfix

        boolean isHotfix()
        Get the 'Hotfix' build flag.

      • isInitialized

        boolean isInitialized()
        Returns true, if the IApplicationContext, was already initialized. So the Injector inside was created. If the IApplicationContext is disposed, the method will return false
        Returns:
        true, if initialized.

      • isMemoryEcoMode

        boolean isMemoryEcoMode()
        If set, the application should save as much memory as possible.

      • removeProjectContext

        void removeProjectContext()
        Call this method to delete the ProjectContext.

      • setEclipseApplicationContext

        void setEclipseApplicationContext(org.eclipse.equinox.app.IApplicationContext context)
        Sets the current eclipse context of the running application.
        Parameters:
        context -

      • setMode

        void setMode(EApplicationMode mode)
        Set the current application mode. Needs to be set only if running in GUI mode, since the default is HEADLESS.

      • setRequiresApplicationSettings

        void setRequiresApplicationSettings()
        Enable IApplicationContext requires application settings.

        This will enable that getApplicationSettings() will block until the LicenseManager was correctly initialized.

      • setRequiresGeneratorSettings

        void setRequiresGeneratorSettings()
        Enable IApplicationContext requires application settings.

        This will enable that getGeneratorSettings() will block until the LicenseManager was correctly initialized.

      • setRequiresStartupWithoutSIP

        void setRequiresStartupWithoutSIP()
        Enable IApplicationContext requires start-up without SIP.

        This will enable that getRequiresStartupWithoutSIP().
